name: Competitions Australia
overview:
Australia’s competitions website at www.lottos.com.au. One of Australia’s longest running websites, being founded in 2000.

First web application in Australia, called CompTracker, which allows members to tick competitions as ‘entered’, plus many other options like to ‘follow up’ competitions. Save words or less competitions answers too.

Over 150 options to sort or list competitions. No distractions as there are no spammy emails and an advert free website.

Access via phone for training or answers to questions.

The site monitored to ensure it’s a friendly environment.

The lottos.com.au motto is ‘more winners more often’ and a visit to the lottos.com.au home page confirms it as members won over $5.5 million of prizes in 2011.

David Bartlett, former Premier describes lottos.com.au as a “crowd sourced content aggregation socially enabled pay wall website”. Lottos.com.au simply say we are Australia’s longest running originally owned competitions website.

The technical term for a consumer competition is a trade promotion lottery. Hence the abbreviation to lottos.com.au.
